A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sigh. Perhaps it was the hype coming out of TFA and the epic battles in R1\, but  this just left me underwhelmed. I honestly appreciated the attempts to vary the story line but I felt like ultimately this was the same thing I've seen for 5 movies now. Some of the cgi was notably ......off.Serious threads of the previous installment where underserved or just not brought up at all. What's the point of a sequel? Score was good\, certain action scenes we're good\, pacing was off in the sense that there were 2 3rd acts which ultimately end up taking you out of the story\, way to many coincidences that seemed ridiculous.....Very frustrating.
